Summary: I sighted the object and called my wife to tell her to take pictures.
divs: sighting detailsi left for work to go to ann arbor from burton michigan. as i was driving i kept noticing a bright object stationary in the sky. at first i thought it was an aircraft that had previously left from bishop airport . after about a 1\2 hour and the object never moved ,i called home and told my wife to go outside and look in the easterly direction. she seen it too. she took pictures with the camera and went back inside. she never looked again to see how long it was there and i reached just out side of ann arbor and it was still visible in the parking lot at work . one noticable thing about the object is the moonlight was pointing directly at it . it appeared it was in alighnment with the sun and moon . is this a planet or star ? way to bright to belong there and seemed too low in the sky. my wifes pictures show a shape i could no see with my naked eye as it was too bright .
